name: Erciyes RIA Development Framework
short_description: Erciyes RIA Development Framework is a rich Internet application development framework. It utilizes Flash with Ajax-like web requests on the client. Server-side process is carried using IIS and ASP.NET. Both Oracle and MSSQL support is provided.
